item.description:
Let us have a night to just listen to some 80s
Music & relax.

www.thefugitivesband.com/

They will be at the Stonebridge
50 Daniel St. Milford, CT
203 874 7947

www.stonebridgerestaurant.com/

www.danielstreetclub.com/

In Downtown Milford on Friday, November 16.

We will have a Paranormal Meet Up on Saturday,
But Friday night is a wind down night.

The band usually starts later in the evening around 9 pm.

I will give the directions to the Restaurant,
But it has a small parking area.
I usually park over by the Milford Green.
The Milford Green is included in the directions below.
If you are parked by the Milford Green, then walk towards
The Subway Restaurant.
Keep walking straight down the street on the right hand side around the Subway
Towards the Milford Library and Fire Station &
You will be going towards the Stonebridge.


Directions
I 95 Northbound
I 95 North to Exit 36 (Plains Road) End of Ramp Take Right.
Continue Straight Thru Light, Then thru Two Stop Signs.
After Second Stop Sign, Go over Rail Road Bridge to Light,
Take Left onto Bridgeport Avenue,
Continue Straight thru Milford Green thru Second Light.
Bear Left at Fork in Road.
The Restaurant is on the Immediate Right.

I 95 Southbound
I 95 South to Exit 39A (Route 1 South).
Go Under Thruway & Merge all the way to the Left Lane.
Continue Forward onto Cherry Street. Count Four Lights.
Turn Left at Citizen Bank onto Gulf Street.
At First Light, Turn Right onto New Haven Avenue.
Follow to Rotary.
The Restaurant is on the Immediate Right.

Merritt Parkway (Northbound or Southbound)
Proceed on the Parkway to Exit 54 (the Connector);
Take First Exit Off of Connector (95 Southbound).
Take First Exit (Exit 36 ? Plains Road)
Follow I 95 Directions as stated above to the Stonebridge Restaurant.

If their drummer, Mark, ever gets a computer, then he will become a
Member of our group.
If I ever get a chance to give the Forbidden Zone Collectables Store
Story, then I will explain how he is a co founder of this group.

group.name: Greater New Haven Unknown Zone Meetup Group

item.name: Listen to some 80s Music & Relax in Milford
